entry.title: Replacement Battery Compatible For Huawei P30
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 15.99

You have a Huawei P30 that no longer holds a charge the way it did when it was new?

Your device shuts down unexpectedly ?

Your cell phone only works when the battery is plugged in ?

Those are common symptoms that a defective battery will have.

It is time to get a new replacement battery.

The old battery in your cell phone can outgrow inside and damage the internals.

The OEM Batteries compatible for Huawei P30 are brand-new batteries coming directly from our manufacturer. They are custom built for customers who demand the same quality as original P30 batteries. 

  • Zero cycle count
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • No wrapping for a better fit
  • High output current capacity
  • 1 Year Warranty

Compatibility

This battery is only compatible with Huawei Huawei P30.
